title: Drawing, "Desing for a Monogram: Z. B.", 1930–45
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and black ink on cream illustration board
markings: On verso, a Canson and Montgolfier label.
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right corner: Z. B.; upper right corner: 1082.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Monogram designed in negative space within a black square, white "Z" with cross bar continuing into a "B" formed by two white semi-circles.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Desing for a Monogram: Z. B.", 1930–45.
1930–45. Pen and black ink, brush and black ink on cream illustration board. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-81.
